body.name: Home Office Chair Mesh Desk Chair Ergonomic Office Chair with 3D Arms Back Lumbar Support Swivel Rolling Task Chair(Black)
features: ✿Comfortable Seating - Office chair have excellent breathable design, maintain the air flowing naturally in the chair seat area keep the sweat and back were not overheating.

✿Good Lumbar Support - Office chair with the back separate independent support design of the back waist in a targeted manner always gives the body a full range of dynamic fit support, which breaks down the back pressed and protect the health of the spine.

✿Easy to Set UP - Office chair comes with all hardware & necessary tools. Follow the chairs instruction, simple bolted connections can allow for quick and easy assembly. Task chair estimated in about 15-30mins.

✿Adjustable Function - Following the principals of ergonomics. Healthy seating with 3 positions tilt lock (90 ° / 110 ° / 120 °), UP down and rotation armrest, Adjustable headrest for office chair provide natural balance and total support.

✿Quality Material - We guarantee you will love this high-back computer chair. But if you’re not satisfied with this office chair, please get in touch with us. Desk chair does include a weight limit of 250 pounds.
body.description: Office chair has superior grade casters along with heavy duty steel base, breathable mesh back, high density foam seat cushion, PU casters which has a 250lbs weight capacity for ergonomic high back office chair. And designed with targeted lumbar support, by adjust the headrest and seat height and 3D armrest, provide natural balance and total support. Feature ☛Office chair easy to assemble. ☛Beautiful generous and strong practicability. ☛A full range of dynamic fit lumbar support. ☛3 positions tilt lock, UP down and rotation armrest, Adjustable headrest. ☛Adjust the height of the office chair to fit People of different heights. ☛Free locked mechanism suit the posture of work or rest. ☛360 degree swivel wheel and chair can be more flexible in working station. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Headrest Office chair has 6cm lift up and down and rotation headrest, to personalize the chair to your preference. Breathable Seat Desk chair with breathable mesh seat, high density foam seat cushion were keep the sweat and back were not overheating. Function Armrest UP down and rotation adjustable armrest for improve your posture to reduce tension in your shoulders and spine whatever working or relaxing. Ergonomic Design Following the principals of ergonomics. Healthy seating with curved lumbar to support the natural curve of your spine, 3 positions tilt lock (90 ° / 110 ° / 120 °).

Adjustable Relaxing This rotational handle can control the rocking function of the chair, turn right the chair can be rocked a lot. Comfortable Seating You can pull out on the control handle, which allows yours to tilt back sit forward, just push the control handle in to prevent it from rocking. Commercial Class3 Gas-lift Computer chair with extra thickness gas lift, fast up and down, you will feel safety, comfortable and convenient in your live. 360-Degree Swivel & Casters Office chair have swivels degrees for multitasking convenience, and its durable casters allow for smooth-rolling mobility from one area of the office to another again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to put together and is well maintained. Very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair was moderately easy to assemble with the tool provided. I like the mesh construction and firmness and fit of the chair for my bad back. The price was attractive, about the same as the shipping charge, which was worth it given the very fast delivery (almost a week earlier than projected). There are probably better chairs for purchase, but at over five times the price of this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Feels like a quality, sturdy product. The back and neck rest sit perfectly to my body. I like the locking mechanism on the tilt adjustment, if released without tension it doesn’t fly forward. I switched out the wheels for roller blade wheels, but the wheels it came with feel sturdy. Assembly was very straightforward and simple. I’m 5’4 and at it’s lowest level my feet are not completely flushed with the floor, my toes do touch. However, the legs are metal so I feel comfortable placing my feet on them. Overall I’m satisfied with my purchase and would recommend this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's nice but you get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: The chair itself is great and serves its purpose as mentioned in the description. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because sometimes it can be so squeaky when I'm rocking back and forth or simply trying to move across the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great desk chair - 2 days in!!
reviews.reviewText: like this chair a lot , only 2 days in but rolls well and has lumbar support and is all mesh so cool and no foam seat that will just het hard over time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: The chair is a positive upgrade to the more expensive chair that I bought several years ago. The features work well and it is a very comfortable addition to my work-from-home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you need upper body support while sitting upright, do not buy this chair.
reviews.reviewText: It's bee a while since I bought this item, but I have finally used it. It was easy to relatively assemble. I had my husband put it together since I have a limited lifting capacity.The big problem: the back does not adjust forward. It is springy, just like advertised - that isn't the problem. The back is situated too far back and I do not have any upper body support when I sit upright in it. This is a major problem because I see the support to sit and work using it. I do not have enough room under the desk to scoot all the way under it to take advantage of the support offered.Currently, I'm working on my second novel (The Order of Purity. First novel: The Order of the Cross will soon be available) so upper back support is crucial.If you need upper body support while sitting upright, do not buy this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair for the Price! I Totally Recommend.
reviews.reviewText: Love it! The lumbar support is excellent and I like the adjustable headrest. Assembly is relatively easy, but the directions can get a little confusing-- but not much. Perfect for remote workers like me.
